paper_abstract: The modified Craig-Sneyd (MCS) scheme is a promising splitting scheme of the ADI type for multi-dimensional pure diffusion equations having mixed spatial-derivative terms. In this paper we investigate the extension of the MCS scheme to two-dimensional convection-diffusion equations with a mixed derivative. Both necessary and sufficient conditions on the parameter theta of the scheme are derived concerning unconditional stability in the von Neumann sense. (C) 2011 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Stability of the modified Craig-Sneyd scheme for two-dimensional convection-diffusion equations with mixed derivative term
